mapper.sql: collect_id, user_id, target_type, target_id, add_time, status
mapper.insert:
insert into auto_collect (
user_id, target_type, target_id, add_time, status ) values (
#{userId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.select:
select acl.*,ac.car_name as carName,au.user_name as userName,aup.real_name as realName from auto_collect as acl inner join auto_car as ac on acl.target_id=ac.car_id inner join auto_user au on acl.user_id=au.user_id left join auto_user_profile as aup on au.user_id=aup.user_id
and ac.car_name like concat('%',#{carName},'%')
and au.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and acl.user_id = ${userId}
order by acl.add_time desc,acl.collect_id desc
